Best regards

From: Jackie Merchant <jmerchant@ev-lab.io <mailto:jmerchant@ev-lab.io> > 
			Sent: Thursday, 10 July 2025 1:39 PM
			To: Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com <mailto:Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com> >
			Cc: Connie Madeira <Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com> >; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >; Uroosa Ghafoor <uroosa.ghafoor@nascodubai.com <mailto:uroosa.ghafoor@nascodubai.com> >; Mary Janice Dofeliz <MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com> >; Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com <mailto:Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com> >; Government Affairs <Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> >
			Subject: Re: FW: Chevrolet bolte : REAL EMIRATES - Addition of Vehicle wef 04/07/2025

			 

			CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
			تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

			Dear Mohammed, 

			 

			Thanks for the reply, Insurance is updated in the RTA system. I just need somebody to be available in person to get the transfer done.

			 

			 As per my experience from last time it didn't work. Please issue a POA and I will do the needful. However this will further delay the process. Let me know how you would like go forward with it. 

			 

			Regards, 

			Jackie.
